[2023年装备博览会] “耐火双层管”福英管 - 菲英Across有限公司最先出现在在线观看展览！ WorldTradeShow.tv | CHINA。
item.content:encoded:
According to Funen Across Co., Ltd., their fire-resistant double-layer pipes are highly sought after in the market. With an emphasis on safety and reliability, the company has gained a reputation for producing top-quality products.
Their featured product, the Across Joint series, has garnered a loyal customer base over the years. It is known for its exceptional fire resistance, making it ideal for various applications.
One of the company’s latest offerings is the non-combustible sound insulation pipe. This innovative product is created by treating the conventional two-layer fire-resistant pipe with sound insulation at the factory. While the standard fire-resistant double-layer pipes already have good sound insulation properties, the non-combustible sound insulation pipes take it a step further.
These pipes are particularly beneficial for customers who are concerned about the noise generated by drainage pipes in multi-unit residential buildings. By using non-combustible sound insulation pipes, building owners can enjoy improved sound insulation, resulting in a quieter living environment.
As Funen Across Co., Ltd. continues to innovate and provide solutions for their customers’ needs, they remain a trusted leader in the industry.Generated by OpenAI

网站：https://www.funen.co.jp/

item.title: [2023年装备博览会] 不间断水冷冻法 - 添田株式会社关东分公司
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
At the Equipment Expo 2023, Soeda Co., Ltd. Kanto Branc […]

[2023年装备博览会] 不间断水冷冻法 - 添田株式会社关东分公司最先出现在在线观看展览！ WorldTradeShow.tv | CHINA。
item.content:encoded:
At the Equipment Expo 2023, Soeda Co., Ltd. Kanto Branch showcased an innovative product called the uninterrupted water freezing method. This construction method involves freezing the water inside a water pipe using liquid nitrogen, effectively stopping the water flow without causing extensive water outages.
The branch manager of Soeda Co., Ltd. Kanto Branch spoke about the merits of this method during an interview. He explained that the uninterrupted water freezing method allows for water pipe construction to be carried out with minimal interruptions in water service. This means that partial water outages can be managed while construction work is being conducted, ensuring minimal inconvenience to the residents or businesses using the affected water pipes.
By employing this method, Soeda Co., Ltd. aims to revolutionize the water pipe construction industry by reducing the impact on daily water usage during construction projects. This not only saves time and resources but also minimizes disruptions to the community.
With the Kanto branch now open, Soeda Co., Ltd. is eager to provide their services and encourage individuals and businesses to make use of their uninterrupted water freezing method. The branch manager expressed his commitment to delivering the highest quality work and ensuring customer satisfaction.
Overall, the uninterrupted water freezing method showcased by Soeda Co., Ltd. at the Equipment Expo 2023 presents an innovative solution to the challenges faced during water pipe construction. It is a promising technology that can greatly improve efficiency and minimize inconvenience for all parties involved.Generated by OpenAI

网站：https://to-ketsu.com/

item.description:

[2023年装备博览会] 一触式安装硬锁 S - 巴库马工业有限公司最先出现在在线观看展览！ WorldTradeShow.tv | CHINA。
item.content:encoded:
[2023年设备博览会] 一键式连接紧固件 S – 磐熊工业有限公司
[第55届管道设备和设备综合展览会] 推入连接紧固件 硬锁 S – 磐熊工业有限公司。我是磐熊工业的代表，我们是一家房屋设备制造商。我们公司生产空调、通风、以及与水相关的产品。在这次展览会上，我们将推出一款名为硬锁 S 的新产品，非常荣幸这里给予我们这个机会。该产品是用于给水管道连接的热水供应和供水管道接头，我们在其中加入了一种分层环。通过视觉可以确认是否插入不足。您可以从外部检查插入情况，所以安装人员可以放心地在之后检查安装情况，并且该环在黑灯下会发出粉色的光，即使在黑暗的地方也能一眼看到，方便后续检查。而且，尽管这是行业中的首创，我们还提供了10年的保修期，因此供热和供水将长时间使用，制造商也可以安心提供保修服务。因此，这是一款每个人都可以放心使用的产品。希望建筑公司和分销商能够考虑这款产品。非常感谢。Generated by OpenAI

网站：https://www.bakuma.co.jp/

item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
在2023年的设备展上，ARTISAN有限公司展示了他们开发并销售的信息链接系统和现场中心。该公司旨在为建筑和 […]

[2023年装备博览会] 现场中心 - 工匠有限公司最先出现在在线观看展览！ WorldTradeShow.tv | CHINA。
item.content:encoded:
在2023年的设备展上，ARTISAN有限公司展示了他们开发并销售的信息链接系统和现场中心。该公司旨在为建筑和维修公司提供合适的信息管理解决方案。建筑公司通常需要管理各种信息，但通常需要花费大量时间才能找到需要的信息。为此，ARTISAN提供了一个信息搜寻功能，并可通过询问相关负责人来检索信息。ARTISAN认为，这种情况的原因是信息被分散存储。他们相信，通过将信息集中存储，工作效率也会得到提高。用户界面被设计得非常简单，方便建筑和维修公司，尤其是工匠使用，每个人都可以直观地使用它。如果你是一家建筑和维修公司，希望提高工作效率，请随时联系我们。ARTISAN还将发放免费试用ID，所以请不要犹豫与我们联系。这就是关于ARTISAN在设备展上展示的产品的相关信息。Generated by OpenAI

网站：https://lp.gembahub.jp/
